title: the Planning and Development, Heritage and Broadcasting (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Heritage
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Heritage 
and Broadcasting (Amendment) Act 2021 (Part 2) (Commencement) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development heritage broadcasting (amendment) act 2021 (part 2) (commencement) order

title: the Planning and Development, Heritage and Broadcasting (Amendment) Act
the Planning and Development, Heritage and Broadcasting (Amendment) Act
heading: 2. The 14th day of June 2021 is appointed as the day on which Part 2 of
text_raw:
2. The 14th day of June 2021 is appointed as the day on which Part 2 of 
the Planning and Development, Heritage and Broadcasting (Amendment) Act 
2021 (No. 11 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [279] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 June, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [279] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
